snippet: Local organizers expect more than 450,000 fans to visit Richmond, Va., during the road world championships, which begin Saturday.
lead_paragraph: Local organizers expect more than 450,000 fans to visit Richmond, Va., during the road world championships, which begin Saturday.

headline.main: United States to Become Center of the Cycling World
headline.print_headline: United States to Be Center of Cycling World for 9 Days
